'I am so very sorry!'%K%P
I was bowing to the ground in front of Sara,\napologizing for watching her get changed.%K%P
I was doing a really good job, if I do say so myself.%K%P
'Now, that's enough, there's no need to apologize\nso much!  I really don't mind...'%K%P
'Or, are you saying you saw something\nparticularly embarrassing, Yamato?'%K%P
'N-no, I didn't... \nI mean, I saw the silhouette of something...'%K%P
'Mmkay, I think that's still safe.'%K%P
Even without seeing the important bits,\nSara's silhouette in that dress had been more\nexciting than mere nudity ever could be.%K%P
I didn't want her to see me like this,\nso I kept my face averted.%K%P
'Hmm...? Could it be... Are you embarrassed?'%K%P
'Well, it is embarrassing... \nAfter all, I did get caught watching the famous\nDivine Idol getting changed.'%K%P
And if Sara's fans found out,\nit could cause all kinds of trouble.%K%P
At the same time, seeing her like that had been\nextremely...stimulating...%K%P
'Heehee, well, you are about the right age\nto start thinking about stuff like that,\naren't you, Yamato?'%K%P
After teasing me a little,\nsuddenly she seemed to soften.%K%P
She wrapped her arms around me and\nrested her weight on my body, like always.%K%P
'W-wait, Sara! What are you doing?!'%K%P
'You're so cute, Yamato! \nGetting so worked up over a hug!'%K%P
'Of course! I mean, anyone would get like this,\nbeing hugged by a beautiful woman like you.'%K%P
'Right, right. But it makes me kinda happy! \nCome here and give big sis a squeeze!'%K%P
'Squueeeze!♪'%K%P
She must have thought my resistance was funny,\nbecause she pressed her whole body against\nme and squeezed.%K%P
She was so soft and warm, and smelled so good,\nI forgot for a moment that she was a goddess\nand an idol.%K%P
'Good afternoon... Huh?'%K%P
A customer showed up at the worst possible moment.%K%P
'Oh, look, a customer! Welcome!'%K%P
Sara greeted the customer pleasantly,\nstill pressed up against me.%K%P
'Hey...let go of me! \nYou're scaring the customer.'%K%P
Peeling Sara off of me, I forced a smile on my face.%K%P
'Welcome, thank you for coming! So uhh...'%K%P
And I finally noticed. \nIt was the girl from the street performance earlier.%K%P
'I'm sorry. Never mind. \nI'll go somewhere else.'%K%P
'No, wait, aren't you Shuri Kisshouten?'%K%P
'You know who I am...?'%K%P
She stopped at my words, just as she had been\nwalking out the door.%K%P
'I just found out.  You performed in front of\nAkihabara station today, didn't you?'%K%P
'You saw my show?'%K%P
Her wary look didn't change,\nbut somehow she seemed happier.%K%P
'So that must mean you're a fan. \nThank you for coming to my show!'%K%P
She might have been embarrassed thanking me directly,\nbecause she turned bright red and stuck her hand out.%K%P
'C'mon! You're a fan, I'm supposed to shake\nyour hand!  I'm Shuri Kisshouten,\nit's nice to meet you!'%K%P
'N-nice to meet you...'%K%P
I was half-forced into shaking her hand.%K%P
But it was true that her street performance had\nmoved me.  She'd kind of just decided I was a fan,\nbut I didn't mind, actually.%K%P
'Oh, so you're Shuri!  I'm so happy to meet you,\nyour sister is always such a big help.'%K%P
'Uh... Huh?!'%K%P
'What is Sara Benzaiten doing here?!'%K%P
'Oh, this is my boyfriend's house!'%K%P
Joking around, she embraced me again.  I really\nwished she would get her pranks under control.%K%P
'B-boyfriend?! Is this some kind of scandal?! \nAm I some kind of witness now?'%K%P
Shuri was almost ready to explode. \nHer statements were becoming almost incomprehensible.%K%P
Sara was an old hand at pranks, and since Shuri's\ncomposure was wearing thin this prank just added\nfuel to the fire.%K%P
'Oh, I know, you're an impersonator! \nYou're some kind of bonehead beauty who looks\nlike Sara Benzaiten, that must be it!'%K%P
'Oh, so that's what you think? \nWell, I guess I'd better show you what I've got!'%K%P
'Mph♪'%K%P
Sara let out a cute little sound and\nher whole body started to shine with a faint light.%K%P
'What do you think? Is this enough to prove\nI'm the real Sara Benzaiten?'%K%P
Far beyond a mere costume change,\nin an instant her whole body morphed.%K%P
Now dressed in her full L☆SEVEN outfit,\nSara exuded an aura that no mere idol could match.%K%P
'Oh wow... That's the same as your stage outfit...'%K%P
'So do you believe me now?'%K%P
'Yes. But...'%K%P
'What exactly is your relationship\nwith this human male...?'%K%P
She turned her suspicious gaze on me,\nas if I were some kind of villain.%K%P
I guessed that being over-familiar with Sara,\nwho was apparently worthy only of worship, seemed\nto make me look like a dangerous stalker.%K%P
'Like I said, he's my boyfriend!♪'%K%P
Sara, still not taking the hint,\nembraced me yet again.%K%P
'Noooooooo!!'%K%P
'Stop screwing around! \nShe's going to believe you!'%K%P
'So that means...'%K%P
'Sorry, I was just teasing.  Yamato is the owners'\nson, I've known him for ages.'%K%P
'Is that really true...?'%K%P
'Come on, look into my sparkling eyes. \nWould I lie to you?'%K%P
'Whoa...your lashes are so long!\nYou really have the right stuff for a top idol.'%K%P
So do you believe me?'%K%P
'I guess so.... Now that I think about it,\nhow could Sara Benzaiten have a boyfriend?'%K%P
At any rate, it looks like we cleared up\nthat misunderstanding.%K%P
'So anyway,\nwhat brings you to a kimono shop, Shuri?'%K%P
'Oh, yes, welcome! \nCan I help you find anything?'%K%P
I switched into customer-service mode.%K%P
'Oh, yeah... Umm... Well...'%K%P
'Oh, are you looking for an idol outfit?'%K%P
'Y-yeah... But I really need you\nto keep this secret from my sister.'%K%P
As Sara explained,\nShuri's big sister was Bishamonten.%K%P
She was a member of L☆SEVEN,\nand was apparently quite close to Sara.%K%P
'I don't mind keeping it a secret,\nbut are you hiding your idol activities from her?'%K%P
'If I told her I was trying to be a Divine Idol,\nI'm sure she'd just worry about me...'%K%P
'She would worry, and start trying to poke\nher nose in... Yeah, the way I know her,\nthat wouldn't surprise me at all.'%K%P
Sara clearly thought Bishamonten was a bit\nof a worrywart when it came to her little sister.%K%P
'I don't want to be a burden to her. \nSo I'm keeping it a secret until I can show\nher I'm good enough.'%K%P
'If I pass this audition,\nI just know she'll recognize what I can do.'%K%P
'I want to be able to stand at my sister's side\nwithout being embarrassed, that's the kind\nof Divine Idol I want to be...'%K%P
If she went public as a raw amateur, she'd just hold\nher sister back.  So she wanted to reach her full\npotential before taking the stage by her sister.%K%P
Even I could understand the sense in that.%K%P
But one thing did bother me.%K%P
'May I ask one question?'%K%P
'What exactly do you mean by 'this audition'?'%K%P
The room froze at my question.%K%P
'I kind of thought that was the case,\nYamato, but you honestly don't have any idea?'%K%P
'No way, you really don't know about the audition?! \nI mean, it's been on all the news shows,\nand there are posters up all over the place'%K%P
'No, I'm sorry, but I honestly don't know\nwhat you're talking about.'%K%P
The two both had a look on their faces like\n'What's wrong with this poor idiot?'.%K%P
And then someone else showed up to rub my face in it.%K%P
'Hellooo!'%K%P
'Eh... Huh? What is Sara Benzaiten doing here?'%K%P
It was yet another goddess I'd just met earlier.%K%P
'This girl is reacting exactly like I did...'%K%P
'Well then, I guess I'd better\ngive him another squueeeze!♪'%K%P
A grinning Sara wrapped her arms around me again.%K%P
'Huh?! \nPl-please, stop that!'%K%P
'If he's not your boyfriend, please stop hugging him.\nThat's not appropriate to do in public.'%K%P
Since I was frozen in place,\nShuri peeled Sara off for me.%K%P
'Oooh! I've uncovered Sara Benzaiten's lover! \nBut wait, isn't that Yamato?'%K%P
'Oh... Hi, Kagura. It's you again.'%K%P
'Eheheheh, it's me again, Yamato!'%K%P
'Ohoh? Do you know each other?'%K%P
'I'd like to know this as well. \nIt appears that we're schoolmates.'%K%P
Indeed, Shuri and Kagura were wearing the same\nuniform.  The design was slightly different,\nbut Sara's was the same, too.%K%P
Now that Shuri had pointed it out, these three\ngoddesses clearly all went to the same school.%K%P
It was the second year since the establishment\nof the Divine Education Act. In places all over the\ncountry, these educational zones were expanding.%K%P
The area spreading from Ueno Okachimachi to\nAkihabara had been designated as one of these zones.%K%P
Being in Kanda, I didn't have a lot of direct\ncontact, but I knew that there was a designated\nschool over by Yushima. %K%P
'So it looks like you're all students at the same\nschool but you've never met, so maybe you should\nintroduce yourselves.'%K%P
'I guess I should start, since it's my idea. \nI'm the only son of the owners of 'Tatsumi's',\nYamato Tatsumi.'%K%P
'I'm Shuri Kisshouten. For the time being,\nI'm hoping to become a Divine Idol.'%K%P
'My name's Sara Benzaiten, I'm a Divine Idol! \nI'm also currently Yamato's lover!♪'%K%P
'Okay, Okay, I think I've had enough of that joke.'%K%P
Shuri had enough experience now to know\nto stop Sara when she tried to grab me.%K%P
'And so, you are? \nIt's easy to see you're a goddess, but otherwise...'%K%P
'I'm Kagura Amauzu! Trying to be a Divine Idol! \nUmm... I'm also basically an Ame no Uzume...'%K%P
'Oh, the fortunate one...\nIt's a pleasure to meet you!'%K%P
Sara shook her hand with a gentle smile.%K%P
Getting her hand shook by the famous center\nfor L☆SEVEN, Kagura went stiff with nervousness.%K%P
'If you want to become a Divine Idol too,\nthen you're probably up for the big audition, right?'%K%P
'Yep, of course I entered! \nBut I'm way down in the ranks.'%K%P
'I see...\nWe've both got a big fight ahead of us then.'%K%P
It looked like Shuri\nwas in the same boat as Kagura.%K%P
'So, I hate to throw a damper on things,\nbut could someone please go ahead\nand explain this audition to me?'%K%P
'I guess I'd better do that.\nOkay, here's a quick run down.'%K%P
Shuri put on a helpful face,\nand made herself the official audition explainer.%K%P
The popular Divine Idol group L☆SEVEN. \nThey are apparently having an audition for\na new member.%K%P
Many wondered if it was okay to increase\nmembership of a group called L☆SEVEN,\nbut apparently it's not a problem.%K%P
L☆SEVEN started when the Seven Goddesses of\nGood Luck combined to make an idol group.%K%P
And so you would think that the number seven\nwould be important, but apparently even the Seven\nGoddesses of Good Luck were originally eight.%K%P
So based on that idea, this upcoming audition\nwas the first step in renaming the group L☆EIGHT.%K%P
The eighth Goddess of Luck was apparently\nKisshouten. Since Shuri is one of the goddesses\nWakemitama, she's not unrelated to the story.%K%P
'The audition is divided into two parts,\nqualifiers decided by online vote, and the main\naudition decided by performance on stage.'%K%P
'They're right in the middle of the qualifier now.'%K%P
Only those goddesses who make it through the 3 month\nqualifier voting will have a chance to perform in the\nmain audition.%K%P
Every night, the little hatchling Divine Idols\ndo their best to make it to the final round.%K%P
'I think I get the gist of it. \nIt sounds like you two are in a tight spot.'%K%P
'I kind of figured I wouldn't be able to make it\nvery far without a proper Divine Idol outfit...'%K%P
'Since my sister has mentioned Tatsumi's before,\nI thought I'd ask if you could do something for me.'%K%P
'Were you thinking the same, Kagura?'%K%P
'No, I've got an idol outfit.  I heard some rumors\nabout this place, so I came to scout it out.'%K%P
What the heck did she mean by 'scout it out?' \nI was interested to know what kind of rumors\nshe's heard...%K%P
'It looks like the rumors were true! \nSara Benzaiten from L☆SEVEN really is here!'%K%P
'All the members of L☆SEVEN\nget their outfits made here.'%K%P
'Oh, I get it, you thought that if you had your\noutfits made at the same place as L☆SEVEN,\nyou'd share some of their popularity.'%K%P
To preserve their privacy, Tatsumi's never reveals\ndetails of their customers in public.%K%P
But among the goddesses, it looked like our shop\nwas developing a bit of a reputation.%K%P
'Okay then, Ms. Kisshouten,\nwhy don't we discuss the details of your outfit...'%K%P
'Kagura, what about you? \nAre you going to get a new outfit here, too?'%K%P
'No, I think I'll pass. I don't have any money.'%K%P
Even if they were goddesses,\nthey still had the same money problems as humans.%K%P
Leaving aside Sara and her success with L☆SEVEN,\nfor most goddesses things rarely went the way\nthey wanted.%K%P
'Oh, but what should I do? \nIf I don't do something, I'll never move up\nin the rankings!'%K%P
'Well, it's not like I think I'm going\nto shoot up the ranks just by getting a new outfit.'%K%P
'Right, don't think everyone\ngets popular by wearing crazy outfits.'%K%P
Kagura and Shuri both had troubled expressions,\nand even Sara looked thoughtful,\nlike she was getting reeled into their problems.%K%P
'Hey, Sara.'%K%P
'As a current L☆SEVEN member,\ndo you have any advice for them?'%K%P
'Hmm... Let's see...'%K%P
'Sara! 'Please, share your wisdom!'%K%P
'M-me too... Please do help, Sara!'%K%P
The desperate pair drew in close to Sara.%K%P
But she just looked upset.%K%P
'I'm sorry, but I just can't. \nSince I'm involved in the auditions I can't offer\nhelp to any individual goddess.'%K%P
Since she was a member of L☆SEVEN,\nshe would be involved in the decision side of things.%K%P
Since the slightest bit of advice could come across\nas a breach of impartiality, she had to be careful\nwith every word.%K%P
'Oh, I see, that's fair enough.'%K%P
'I should have realized asking Sara\nfor help was too much.'%K%P
'Right, we all have to just do our best on our own.'%K%P
'Your best on your own, huh...'%K%P
I guess idol auditions were always lonely battles.%K%P
But then I thought again. \nIs that really so? I wonder...%K%P
'What about doing it together,\ninstead of on your own?'%K%P
Even if everyone was a rival,\nit didn't mean you had to be enemies.%K%P
By cooperating with another goddess\nin the same situation, at the very least the battle\nwould no longer be lonely.%K%P
'Oh, I see, you mean form a duo?'%K%P
'Ooohh!'%K%P
'That might prove to be fun. \nThere's no rule saying your audition has to be solo!'%K%P
'Alriight! So you and me are a duo now, Shuri! \nIt's settled!'%K%P
'Wait a minute...'%K%P
Shuri kept herself under control,\nthrowing a bit of a damper on Kagura's enthusiasm.%K%P
'I think forming a duo is a good idea,\nbut it doesn't necessarily have to be with you.'%K%P
'Well, yeah, but, I mean...'%K%P
'But, I wonder if you will find\nanother partner so easily?'%K%P
'Now, I'm not exactly saying that Kagura is no good. \nBut if we're going to form a duo together,\nI need to make sure she's suitable.'%K%P
'The partner I choose will have a huge\nimpact on our chances of winning. \nSo I want to be careful here.'%K%P
'I understand what you're trying to say. \nBut how exactly do you plan to make\nthat kind of judgment?'%K%P
'It all depends on Kagura's rank in the voting. \nIf she's a long way below me, then of course\nI can't choose her.'%K%P
'Kagura Amauzu! \nWhat is your current ranking?'%K%P
'Ummm... Well, I think I'm 34th right now...'%K%P
'Huh?'%K%P
'Oh, I knew it. That's too low, isn't it? \nShuri, you're way above me, aren't you?'%K%P
'Oh, well... You see, actually...'%K%P
Shuri was clearly avoiding eye contact. \nShe didn't seem to want to say her own rank.%K%P
'Oh, where is she, where is Shuri...?'%K%P
Sara took out her smartphone,\nand started to check the rankings on the spot.%K%P
'W-Wait!'%K%P
'You're...39th.'%K%P
Well below Kagura.%K%P
'Woohoo! I'm way above you!'%K%P
'Y-You really must be something, huh? \nOkay then, I'll let you join me.'%K%P
Shuri spoke down to Kagura,\ndespite the fact that Kagura was higher on the list.%K%P
'Yeaah! So that means it's settled, right? \nYou can't go complaining after this, got it?'%K%P
'I know, I know. \nOnce I've made a decision, I stick with it.'%K%P
She seemed to reach a resolution.%K%P
They would surely be butting heads from here on out,\nbut we were witnessing the birth of an improvised\nDivine Idol duo.%K%P
'But what, specifically,\nare you going to do as a duo?'%K%P
'Hmmm... Singing the same song and\ndancing in unison, and stuff?'%K%P
'I don't think that's quite enough, do you?'%K%P
'Sara...'%K%P
Even though she'd just denied them,\nKagura continued to try to butter up Sara.%K%P
Sara couldn't resist that kind of schmoozing,\nand couldn't keep brushing her off.%K%P
'I know how you feel, but I just can't. \nAnd anyway, I'm a goddess too,\nwhat are you doing asking me?'%K%P
'An idol's job is to make humans happy,\nso you shouldn't be asking goddesses, ask humans.'%K%P
'So that means...'%K%P
Shuri and Kagura turned their eyes to me.%K%P
'Hold on, now. Me?'%K%P
'Well, you're the only human here.'%K%P
'And you're the one who came up\nwith the idea of forming a duo!'%K%P
'Coming up with the idea for rivals to join forces\nisn't something you see every day.'%K%P
It looked like their esteem for me was rising.%K%P
It was true, though, that goddesses became\nidols to collect Sakimitama, so I understood\nwhy they would ask a human's opinion.%K%P
But why me?%K%P
'Oh, are we troubling you?'%K%P
'No, it's no trouble, just...'%K%P
'Right now, you're the only one we can count on. \nPlease, Yamato! Help us out!'%K%P
Why me? Was all I could keep thinking.%K%P
But, after all, I was the one who offered\nthem this twinkle of hope, not someone else.%K%P
'Okay, fine. If I'm the one you want,\nthen I guess I'll help out.'%K%P
'I, Yamato Tatsumi, as a representative\nof humanity, will cooperate with your pop group,\nShuri Kisshouten and Kagura Amauzu!'%K%P
'Thank you, Yamato!'%K%P
'Yamatoooo!'%K%P
Shuri and Kagura were overcome with happiness,\nand wrapped me in hugs.%K%P
'Mmphh?!'%K%P
'Oh my, you're so popular with the ladies, Yamato!'%K%P
'Oh! 'No, no, it's nothing like that! \nI was just briefly overcome with emotion,\nand got caught up in the moment.'%K%P
Shuri backed away, almost pushing me over\nin the process.  I was glad to be released,\nbut still... a little sad.%K%P
'Well then, I'll do it for you...'%K%P
'No, that's, you know, not good...'%K%P
'After all, I'm the one who just joined a duo.'%K%P
Interrupting Sara as she tried to muscle in on me,\nshe grabbed the cuff of my sleeve.%K%P
She seemed to be showing that although\nshe didn't want to hug me, she didn't want\nto hand over her spot.%K%P
